title: Best of The Herd for Mar 26, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Mar 26, 2020
description:
The Cowboys have no safety net if they screw up the draft

There is a reason why Jameis Winston and Cam Newton can't find jobs and it's not statistical

Scott Boras has the worst idea in the history of sports

Someone finally does a mock draft that isn't terrible according to Colin 


Guest: Charles Barkley, NBA on TNT

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
